subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
I came across your e-mail contact prior to a private search while in need of your assistance. My name is Grace Mugabe, the wife of the Late Zimbabwe leader Robert Gabriel Mugabe, who died on 6th September 2019.
 I have investment funds worth Eighty-Seven Million Five Hundred Thousand United State Dollars ($87.500.000.00 ) and I need a trusted investment Manager/Partner because of my current status, however, I am interested in you for an investment project assistance in your country may be from there, we can build business relationship in the nearest future.
I am willing to negotiate an investment/business profit sharing ratio with you base on the future investment earning profits.
If you are willing to handle this project on my behalf kindly reply to me via my private email.
 to enable me to provide you more information about the investment funds.
Your Urgent Reply Will Be Appreciated.
Best Regards
Mrs. Grace Mugabe

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Mrs. Grace Mugabe,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I am interested in learning more about the investment project you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details regarding the nature of the investment and how it would work?

I appreciate your consideration and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nathaniel

subject: Thank you for your email,
body:
Dear Nathaniel,

Thank you for your email, and please could you elaborate in details, your
contact address, Recent copy of your Utility paid bill Receipt.
Copy of your International passport.
Whatsapp Number.
Present occupation.
Company name and its address.

Secondly, in what sector do you have the intention of Investing these
funds, immediately it gets to your possession? shall be waiting for you, as
I need an honest and dedicated person to work and rely on.

Maximum cooperation  from both, is the strong bone behind our success.
Sincerely.
Grace Mugabe.

subject: Re: Thank you for your email,
body:
Dear Grace Mugabe,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in sharing information. However, before I provide any personal details or documents, could you please explain more about the purpose of these requirements? What is the nature of the investment opportunity you mentioned? I would like to understand how this aligns with my own interests and goals.

Additionally, it would be helpful if you could provide some background information about yourself and your company. This will help me gain a better understanding of who I am communicating with.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Nathaniel
